ValidationRule.description: Closure code CANNOT start with ‘No Penalty or Interest Assessed if there is an amount greater than 0.00 listed in the Penalty & Interest Assessed field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), ((BEGINS(TEXT(Closure_Code__c),'No Penalty or Interest Assessed') )||(BEGINS(TEXT(Closure_Code__c),'Assisted Client - No Penalty Assessed') )), (Penalty_Interest_Assessed__c > 0.00), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Closure code field cannot start with ‘No Penalty or Interest Assessed if there is an amount greater than 0.00 listed in the Penalty & Interest Assessed field.
